channel.description: Recent content in pythonocc on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python occ] I tried using CAD on a jupyter notebook
item.description: I want to tinker with files created with CAD with #python! I’ve heard that .py files can be imported into CAD software to expand their functions, but I thought that there is something that can be run on a jupyter notebook, and looked into it. #Conclusion first there were. I tried hello world in the cad area. What is #python occ pythonocc is a 3D CAD package for python. You can run it on the jupyter notebook!
